overview: Locations: 1) a family-oriented parade in Chicago 2) Facebook 3) Alexander Calderâ€™s Flamingo sculpture in Chicago 4) an ambulance and a car wash 5) somewhere in between our mind and the on/off line public space. A Holy Orders deals with reality and representations and is shaped as an absurdist collage of bizarre interventions against the much loved, determinative structures of faith, conservatism and capitalism in the USA.
title: A Holy Order
